case.state: My name is Elesa. I'm a model. I also happen to be your opponent for tonight.
...I have a bad feeling about what's to come.
Don't think I wouldn't recognize you. You and your little group of white knights put Unova in peril.
All of us Gym Leaders know who you are, N. I cannot ignore the fact you tried to liberate all Pokemon from their trainers.
To think I once disregarded you as just another trainer. What a coincidence Team Plasma's leader challenges me again.
Kanto's Water-type specialist. Ah, right, I recall seeing you at the Pokemon World Tournament.
Don't disappoint me.
Welcome to the main stage.
Alright. Whose star shall shine brightest, I wonder...?
Hmm? Here. Take ~cards~.
Okay... ~cards~.
~Cards~. Thank you.
If I could get ~cards~, that'd be great.
I got room for ~cards~ over here.
Can I get ~cards~? Oh, but, no rush.
Alright! Can I get ~cards~ over here?
Oh Dealer, such a card. Speaking of, ~cards~.
~Cards~. Let's do this!
I wonder which of you will lose this one...
If we can just move on...
Hardly worth the effort.
Just the hand I needed!
Safe and secure this time around.
I have total confidence in this hand. Try and beat it!
Show me the money!
Do you think you can beat me?
Hey. Good luck.
Let's get this rolling, huh?
Passable. At best.
The bog standard. What? Not every hand is going to be amazing.
Let the chips fall where they may. ...Oh, right. No chips in this game.
Keep it choppy, please.
My, this has really gotten exhilierating!
Starting to sweat a little here!
I gotta hand it to you, you've got a great poker face, ~player~.
This could go either way... it really is just like Pokemon battling.
Will this be enough? Who can say?
Wait a minute, wait a minute. You ain't heard nothin' yet!
Kind of unremarkable, really.
Things are going smooth, all things considered.
Are you prepared, ~player~? We wouldn't want to continue without you.
Take your time. This hand's not going anywhere.
Utterly ridiculous.
Feh.
Not worth my time.
Backed into a corner again... sends tingles up my spine.
Despite how desperate the situation is, I'm actually enjoying myself!
Things are getting tense. Oh, how exciting!
I suspect you've fared better than myself.
Gym Leaders are used to facing disadvantages in battle. This is nothing!
Oh. That's... not what I was hoping for.
Mother of mercy, is this the end of Elesa!?
Enjoy your win, everyone. I'm certainly not getting it.
You've got to ask yourself one question: 'Do I feel lucky?' Well, do ya, punk?
I sincerely hope you aren't here to cause any more trouble. I'm here to enjoy myself tonight.
I have my eye on you.

Carpe diem. Seize the day. Make your lives extraordinary...
Okay, references aside, I get the appeal of this game. The risk makes it exciting!
Well, since I'm getting to enjoy everyone's company, here's a question; what sort of movies do you enjoy? I was always a bit of a film fanatic when I was younger.
And here I thought I could ride the whole thing out.
Got your act together, did we?
Finally. I thought you were leaving me out intentionally.
Here's where my look starts to fall apart. Granted, considering all of you...
Guess it was inevitable my ensemble would be messed with.
Think I can coordinate as well out of my clothes as in them?
Prepare to be disappointed.
You seem proud of that one.
Let's not drag this out.
This is where things get spicy.
You've all done well so far. Would you like a reward?
I'll catch up quick, don't you worry.
Seems I was fashion-ably late to the indecent party.
Better late than never, huh?
Well, why not at this point, right?
I was hoping I could avoid this, but...
Now's not the time to crack under pressure. I'll stand strong.
Down to the wire!
Let's not waste time, then.
I'll try and make this interesting.
How prepared are you, I wonder...
For the record, that was my only coat. Don't expect anything that flashy again.
Let's tone it down.
I can afford to be a little pickier now, don't you think?
Well done. I was actually trying that round.
Let's tone it down.
Nicely done. I wasn't expecting you to do so well.
I continue to underestimate you. But no more.
You clearly have potential. I'm not sure why I pretended you didn't.
If you think I'll be shaking from something like this, lemme stop you right there.
Heh. Not bad.
You're really gonna push me this far?
Again? You're really not stopping for anything.
Well, it was a matter of time...
O-Oh... hmm.
Are you excited? You should be.
So soon?
Don't you have someone else to target?
It seems my fame's worked against me this time.
I get you're all eager, but please calm yourselves.
I hardly see how this is fair.
If this is an excuse to see my designer clothes better, you could have asked like normal people.
This one may actually work in my favor.
Well, well. The joke's on you.
Fair enough. But now, things are looking up for me.
Oh... well, far be it from me to disappoint a crowd...
Ouch. I felt that one.
You're pretty merciless, huh?
What rotten luck.
This is like the equivalence of Thunder missing three times in a row. Not fun.
I thought I was better than this.
I thought I could wing it. Guess that's why I never became a Flying-type trainer.
Is there, like, a ref who can verify none of you were cheating?
Not... my best night.
Do you know what they call me...?
Fun fact about these shoes: they're meant to resemble the ends of magnets.
The clashing colors make quite an impression, don't you agree?
Not much will change from this. Aside from, perhaps, feeling a tad shorter.
Finally, I can hear at full volume.
What was I listening to? Woman's secret.
Fashion can be functional, you know.
Hmpff... Give me a moment---you really need to press down hard on that button.
I guess it's time to show you... more... Grr, this thing is pretty tricky to remove. You have to press down hard.
Removing this is a lot harder than you'd expect. Of course, my shorts can stay in place without the safety piece here, but...
I've done some swimsuit shots in the past, but this is going beyond risqué territory... Well, I suppose you all earned it. Just don't go rushing to the tabloids.
I don't think you all know how lucky you are... Well, what happens here stays here. None of you are to say a word, capiche?
I'm really not keen to get naked, but rules are rules and I'm not an exception. Plus, I'm not at all ashamed of my body.
This is it for me... Be honest, were you waiting all night for this?
(sigh) At least I knew what I was getting into. Looks like tonight is your lucky night.
I shouldn't be rewarding you, but rules are rules. Looks like you'll be seeing a naked model tonight.
These headphones are also wireless. Aside from being able to block out unnecessarily loud noises, I could play music or simply white noise.
After all, to be a model, you need confidence in yourself and confidence in your body!
I am the Shining Beauty. And you will know that by the end of the night.
Are you interested? I wasn't expecting that...
What? Did you think I was all serious, all the time? I'm more than that.
You know, it's not often I get the chance to enjoy other's company.
There! Now I can simply sliiiide them down---like so!
There we go. You may have gotten me down to just my top and underwear, but you still have quite a ways to go.
Ahh. Without the safety piece, I can simply slide them down my legs like so. No hands required.
I don't mean to brag, but I've made headphones an iconic look soon after my debut as a gym leader.
I could get use to this.
Be cautious with those---you'd be surprised how costly designer headphones are.
And before you ask: Yes, I was wearing a bra. It's simply built-in with my top.
This crop-top has a built-in bra. Normally, it's quite convenient, but in this case... now you get to see my breasts sooner. Let's just deal the next hand.

No bra? How scandalous!
...Actually, this top does have a bra built-in to it. It's very convenient for when you're changing or getting ready for bed.
Heh, feel free to admire my backside while you're at it.
Here, I'll be generous and turn around too.
I'm still in the game, aren't I? Oooh, I guess you can consider it my Final Gambit. Alright, I'm ready!
Ooooh, this actually frees liberating! Of course this is a one-time thing, but I think I can get used to this for now!
I'm not eliminated from this game yet? That means I might just have a chance.
You're up.
Ah, so it's ~name~'s time to shine.
What will it be this time?
Looks like this hand pulled through for me!
There's no crying in strip poker!
Don't be shy now.
Well... go on.
I see it's ~name~'s turn.
Don't let me distract you now.
Ah... Better luck next time.
I wasn't distracting you, was I?

state.text: You don't seem to be wearing much.

case.state: Please don't waste our time.
You're up!
Ah, so it's ~name~'s time to shine.
Unlucky! Well, someone has to lose.
Alright, let's roll! Show us how it's done, ~name~!
What will it be this time?
There's no crying in strip poker!
You've got this.
I see it's ~name~'s turn.
Don't let me distract you now.
Ah... Better luck next time.
I wasn't distracting you, was I?
Oh! That doesn't happen every day.
Oh, there's a tie. So what happens now?
A tie!? What happens here?
Oh wow! It's just as rare as encountering a shiny Pokemon, isn't it?
I didn't think that would ever happen in our game! What is even the probability of this?
I'm surprised you're even here to begin with, let alone agreeing to play strip poker.
Is that cube important to you or are you simply wearing it for aesthetic reasons?
That hair must be a hassle to handle if you're having trouble removing that pendant.
...What a shame. I mean that.
(sigh) You've gotten me excited, and now you're letting me down.
Oh... I mean, well... Don't let me distract you then.
I'm actually disappointed now.
Ah, seriously!?
Surely you can't be serious.
Seriously? I know you can do better.

state.text: ...I did not pick up on anything you said.

case.state: Slow down, you speak too quickly!

state.text: I'm willing to give you a second chance if you've truly reformed. Let's hope I don't regret this.

case.state: Have you considered cutting off your ponytail?
(Didn't the hero of Unova wear a similiar hat?)
Always next time.
Ugh.
Let's just move on. I don't like wasting prescious time.
Next time you decide to remove an accessory, please remove it quicker.
You know, it's sort of irrtating when I've exposed myself to you and you remove something so small.
Sure, I can see the value of accessories. But I'm not about that in this game!
True. I'm still disappointed, but I'm also going to assume that's your only accessory, so I guess I have no room to complain.
You'll never stand out with such a weak choice.
(sigh)
Right. You still had that. Your ~clothing~.
(sigh) You've gotten me excited, and now you're letting me down.
Seriously!? I'm actually feeling a bit betrayed here!
Surely you can't be serious.
Good choice. Not exactly exciting, but it'll make the end all the sweeter.
No room to flee now!
Try not to disappoint me again. It's hard to ease yourself into this when you pull off moves like that.
Whatever.
You're really letting me down here. I'm here to have fun, not watch someone remove their ~clothing~.
This feels like stalling. I guess I have no room to judge. (I still wish they could've taken off something bigger)
Would you like recommendations for your next choice?
You're removing both your socks and your shoes?
Really? Of all things?
I guess I can deal with that.
At least it's something.
Well, I guess that's no problem for you.
It's the small victories, I suppose.
Ah, right, the 8-item limit.
You're more of a funnyman than an actual clown.
Exquisite. Sublime. Next.
You're really intent on leaving me high and dry, huh?
Not that I got my hopes up, but seriously?
Well, not a total waste of time.
I see you're playing to win.
I'll let it pass, if you promise a better performance later.
Keep it up. You're doing great!
I'm a little jealous you still had something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
Hello...
Ooh, niiiiccceee.
Now this is the good stuff.
Well, I'm satisfied. Go on?
Keep it up and I'll be a very happy woman.
I'll just say you look... good.

state.text: Either you're extremely confident or you're not too concerned about winning.

case.state: I'm doing well. Although, is that really surprising?
Oh! Didn't think we were at this point.
How nice of you to join me.

state.text: Regardless, it shouldn't concern me.
Either way, you're doing really well! I'm actually impressed!

case.state: Okay, okay. Don't get too excited.
Maybe your luck will turn around. Or maybe it won't. Just like a battle, it's a gamble.
Don't look disappointed. It's a good style.
You may have the makings of a model, actually.
Don't fret. I'm not judgemental.
I won't lie. I'm getting a bit excited!
I see you want to match.
I like what I see, ~name~. You're no Black Belt, but still pretty good.
...No, I wasn't staring.
I always appreciate the human body. Even moreso now!
What do you think you're doing?
Oh... cutting right to the chase.
Sorry about your, erm, decency.
Don't tell me you came here just to flash your little Clauncher at me.
Oh... it's a little on the small side, but it's kinda cute.
That's all you're giving me? I'm almost insulted.
I can see why you'd want to show that off.
Finally, it's all paying off.
Finally, it's all paying off.
Sweet Arceus! No wonder you were in a hurry to strip down!
How did you even contain that?
...Somehow, you were under-compensating...

state.text: Is that allowed?

case.state: Men who only love women with large breasts... They're so shallow, aren't they?
I've seen any number of breasts in the changing room. You're in good company.
Don't worry. I'll probably be joining you soon enough!
You know, if you think about it, you're about to match a model's attire.
What is the deal with large breasts anyways? Even as a model, I don't understand.
Don't bother comparing. I think small breasts are lovely too!

state.text: People who shame you for your size are extremely shallow. You should learn to love and appreciate your small breasts despite what everyone else says.

case.state: Don't concern yourself with breast size---take it from me! All breasts are beautiful regardless of shape and size.
Those are perfectly respectable, ~name~. I can say that with confidence!
How cute!
Men always go ga-ga over large breasts, but I always found small breasts just as beautiful.

state.text: You look great! Variety is the spice of life, you know?

case.state: I kind of envy you, honestly. There are advantages to having a flat chest, you know.
Not bad.
...I'll accept it. I don't want this game to be too easy.
Eh, I'll take it.
A decent size. I like them.
Mm-hmm, very nice.
Most prefer them big and some prefer small, but a happy medium is always nice.
Be proud. A chest that size could please anyone!
Good for you.
You seem proud of them, at least.
You may be dealing with bad posture and neck tensions, but... at least you're getting some positive attention.
Well, don't hog all the attention now.
And I thought Skyla's were big...
I could make the obvious jokes, but I'd rather stay abreast with the competiton.
Quite eager, I see.
Hey, if you want to bare it, go for it.
I'm excited to see what you look like!
It's nice to see someone proud of their body without the unneeded vainity. It's quite refreshing.
Well, if you've got it, flaunt it.
Those abs must have been from all that swimming, right?
I can't blame you for wanting to show off. It must've taken a lot of swimming laps to get abs like those.

state.text: Looks very smooth and clean. It's nice that you're maintaining proper hygiene down there.

case.state: I see you've been maintaining it.
Oh...Well, not shaving has it's benefits so I suppose it's more practical. Besides, I have to agree that shaving is a big pain.
Oh! Well, I guess I can understand why you don't bother with shaving. It's such a pain, honestly.
Ah, so that's what it looks like.
I suppose we can make it less awkward by pretending we're at a changing room.
Ah, so that's what it looks like.
I suppose we can make it less awkward by pretending we're at a nude beach? I know Kalos has those.
Hmm... actually, did you throw? You had to have.
Congrats. It looks very nice.
Picturesque, really. I love it.
You must be joking.
I know Alola's more open to this type of thing, but this is ridiculous.
Just... stop right there.
Your acting closer to a Ditto than a proper champion right now.
I feel like you haven't listened to a word I've said, have you?
Do you really have no regard for your own reputation?

state.text: Is this really the path you want to go down? Think about it for a minute...

case.state: You didn't get the memo?
...This is the champion of Alola?
...You're a repeat offender.
This is more of a victory for you than me, isn't it?
Although, considering how... frisky Ditto are known to be...
Uh-huh. Didn't think so.

state.text: ...On the contrary, it seems you'd rather have this reputation.

case.state: I tried. I'm sorry, but it seems you're beyond help.
The aura about you... you're a trainer, aren't you?
A bold style. Or is this your way of saying you're better than me?
And here I thought I dodged all the clowns of Nimbasa on my way here...
Are you a worldly traveller? I get that impression when looking at you.
I want this one out of my sight ASAP. You seem like exactly the sort that would fall in with Team Plasma.
(Did this one follow me? I'd rather avoid scandal if I can help it...)
Heh. Aren't you the fashionable one? You could be a model, too.
Ah... a Psychic. Those are always fun. Or am I thinking of Hex Maniacs?
So pushy. Don't you have better things to be worrying about?
More people need an attitude like yours, ~name~.
I'm not sure you're in the proper mindset for this type of game.
You're just... the polar opposite to what I stand for as a model. You should make people excited for your clothes, not your body.

state.text: I see you have exquisite taste. Might I interest you in my own wares?

case.state: ...Why was this person allowed in?
Ooh, nice. Tan lines are severely underrated on the market.

state.text: ...I ask you not use that camera.
Such marvelous synchronization!
I see you Alolans are... much more relaxed when it comes to this stuff.

case.state: I thought the people of Johto were much more... traditional. Regardless, I hope you can prove me wrong.

state.text: Well then... ~name~, I ask that you tell no one of this. Okay?

case.state: I've heard rumors that Kalos allows nude beaches. I suppose if you're comfortable playing this game, that rumor has some merit to it.

state.text: Admittedly, I'm not too familiar with the land of Hoenn. Aside from a certain water-type trainer just dominating the fashion marker. I guess what I'm trying to say is I'd like to learn more.

case.state: I remember Sinnoh being a very cold, harsh land. This must be a rare opportunity to warm up for you.
Hmph. And here I thought you Kanto trainers were too good to play with someone from Unova.

state.text: More people need an attitude like yours, ~name~! That optimism of yours really shines through!
I'm... utterly baffled.

case.state: That Z-Ring is wasted on you, I can tell.
Okay, I need to ask: are you even trying?
Huh. I may be onto something.
That hat's not even that cool. It looks like a Combusken's crest.

state.text: Listen, Moon... you need help. Bad.
Just count yourself lucky I won't turn you into the police.

case.state: ...I'm... sorry to hear it.
Oh... I'm sorry, N. I didn't realized you had such a troubled life...
Ah... you know, I must say, you pull off the look well. It even fooled me.

state.text: Such a waste of good clothing. My heart goes out to whoever made you.

case.state: I suspect foul play. ...Cheating. Not the move.
This... goes beyond just standard masturbation, doesn't it?
You... are okay, right? This is fairly extreme...
Hmm... I suppose it's safe if I tell you. I'm... a fan of toys like those. Particularly rotorized ones... cliche, I know, but it feels good.
...Call it what you want, I'm fairly certain this really skirts the 'no sex' line. Something like this would pass as pokephilia back in Unova...
Oh, and don't you think about bragging about this. This is a one-time thing and it's to remain private, understand?
I tried not to encourage this. I really did. But even Gym Leaders can't get through to her, I suppose.
If you're expecting pity, I have only a little to spare.
Okay, I'll admit it: I'm curious.
Well! This will be very interesting.
Now this will be interesting! You don't mind showing us how it's done, do you?
Don't back out now---I already gave you a show, and I never give out free shows like this.
Don't worry---I'm not a judgemental person. And hey, I understand if you prefer I don't watch.
Go ahead, make my day... Ah, I always wanted to make that reference!
Oh, here we go. This should be good!
Good Arceus, that chair could pass as a throne! And you're going to masturbate on it?
Good Arceus, that's a fancy chair! Are you seriously going to use it for masturbation, of all things?
I admit, I've wanted to see this in person for the longest time.
Don't worry just because I'm here. You'll barely even notice!
Well, you've got a naked model right in front of you. I think what comes next should be obvious.
I'll have what he's having.
(It's one thing watching another woman masturbating, but when it's the opposite sex.)
This is one hell of a night I'm having. I can't believe I'm actually watching this!
Interesting...
I wonder what's going on in that head of yours...
Does looking at me help? I am a model, after all.
Normally I wouldn't appreciate you looking at me like that, but I suppose in a game like this, we can all use some eye candy.
(It's one thing watching another woman masturbating, but when it's the opposite sex.)
This is one hell of a night I'm having. I can't believe I'm actually watching this!
Interesting... I hope you don't mind me watching.
I wonder what's going on in that head of yours...
Does looking at me help? I am a model, after all.
Normally I wouldn't appreciate you looking at me like that, but I suppose in a game like this, we can all use some eye candy.
I almost want to go again...
Mmm... If looking at me helps, I can allow it for now.
You're quite the lucky guy. Doing something this intimate with the Shining Beauty...
Ahh... It's nice.
Honestly? I can't believe I'm doing this with a guy. Or anyone for that matter.
I hope you're enjoying this.
I'm really putting my trust in you, ~name~. Don't make me regret it.
It's almost mesmerizing...
I swear, if you stain my outfit...
Much more... hands-on than I expected.
Easiest session of your life, right?
Well, I'm showing off a good amount in this. So I don't mind if you stare.
Please don't make this weird...
Ah, so that's how it is...
Fun times.
My, the look on your face...
I wasn't sure what to expect. This was a new sight for me.
So that's it for you. Might want to clean yourself up, while you're at it.
Well, was it worth coming here?
I really hope you didn't get that on anyone's clothes.
I wonder... Is the sensation the same for men?
Interesting. You've put on quite the performance.
So that's it for you then! Well done.
So, how does it feel to have that spotlight on you?
Hey, don't shoot it near me!
Be careful where you aim!
You made quite a mess.
I think that's game.
It's not so bad. Take a moment to forget you're not here.
Sorry you couldn't win. But hey, you did your best! And you managed to beat me too. Trust me, I'm no pushover when it comes to poker!
...Well, go on then.
Well... This is awkward!
Ooh, so close!
Do your best...
Mind if I watch a bit?
Don't wait up for me now!
Just relax, and focus on the sensation.
It'll be easier! Just ease yourself into it. Block out all other sound, if it helps.
You're doing great!
Deep breaths. You'll start to get immersed soon.
Just let me know if you want me to look away for you.
This game isn't natural, but it's nice to get a little dirty every now and then. Don't worry---this will be our secret.
Believe it, it'll feel great after a while. You might not even realize where you are!
Keep it up, ~name~!
You doing okay?
Forget about who I am for a moment, okay? For now, I'm just your opponent, encouraging you. You can do this, okay?
Just concentrate on the feeling. The more you ease yourself into it, the easier it becomes!
Just relax, and focus on the sensation.
Just ease yourself into it. Block out all other sound, if it helps.
Deep breaths, ~name~. It'll be over soon.
Just let me know if you want me to look away for you.
This game isn't natural, but it's nice to get a little dirty every now and then. Don't worry---this will be our secret.

Just concentrate.
You're really getting into it, aren't you?
Well at least you seem to be enjoying yourself.
This isn't such a big issue for you, isn't it, ~name~? Good for you!
You don't seem to mind the attention.
Interesting...
It sort of feels like I'm invading your privacy. Umm, sorry if I'm making you uncomfortable.
You're really getting into it, aren't you?
Try and think of it as a bonus for yourself. The orgasm is almost worth it.
Nice technique!
Hmm... I wonder what advice can I give? Would you even need it? I mean, you look like you have some experience.
I hope me talking doesn't annoy you. Really, I want everyone here to enjoy themselves!
This is kind of surreal... (And also kind of hot...)
To think I've never heard of this place, seeing what goes on inside! It's like a modern day speakeasy!
This feels like something that would only occur in Vegas, and we're not even there... although a trip would Vegas would sound nice right around now...
I'll have what she's having.
You'll be fine. Promise.
How are you feeling?
Feeling good yet?
...Oh, I can look away. I guess.
Sorry...
Um, wow. You're getting into it, huh?
Maybe we should dim the lights...
Feels nice, doesn't it?
I wonder which one of us will finish first?
Looking at you helps a bit, ~name~. I hope you don't mind if I look at you for tips.
An exchange in techniques could be helpful.
This feels very... intimate. Doing this with a stranger. I can't help but wonder if this is just some bizarre dream I'm having.
I'm just asking out of curiousity, but... How do you feel about electrostimulation, ~name~?
It's electrifying, isn't it?
I find it fun when I visualize the reaction my body is having with each touch. Maybe you should try that.
Oh! What a way to finish.
I wasn't sure what to expect.
Awkward situations aside... That must've felt pretty good, huh?
Not bad, ~name~.
Well, I think that was fun for both of us.
A satisfying conclusion.
Very, very nice.
I wasn't sure what to expect.
So that's it for you.
Well, was it worth coming here?
Makes your head spin, doesn't it? All that sexual tension leading up to that wonderful release!

state.text: Absolutely dazzling! Why don't you just sit back and enjoy the afterglow now?

case.state: That rush you get is just so amazing, isn't it? Like riding a rollercoaster from the top?
My turn will come eventually. It's just... the matter of when.
It jjust gets more exhilarating, doesn't it?
Mmm... Nice finish. How does it feel to have that spotlight on you?
Masturbation? Arceus, what have I gotten into here!?
Masturbation? That's the penatly? And why haven't I been informed of this? If you're going to invite me, let me know what I'm getting into here!
Wait, what!? Why wasn't I told about this?
(sigh) Looks like that's it for me. It was kind of silly of me to think I could win...
Should I really...? Ah, what the hell, I guess I'll live a little.
This... really isn't what a gym leader should be doing.
Unbelievable.
Normally I would decline, but... What the heck, everyone here has seen all of me anyways. Might as well try to enjoy myself, despite how... public this is.
Seriously? I have half a mind to just leave. But fine, I don't like to disappoint.
Looks like I'll be putting on a private show.
Not a word to the public, okay?
We're all a little dirty here, aren't we? This'll be our little secret.
If only I can get some electrostimulation involved. It feels really good, as long as you make sure you use it safely.
(Now I wish I bought my violet wand.)
